values.heading: Our Values
values.title: Shababna Values
values.subtitle: We believe in strong values that guide all our work and direct us toward empowering youth and building a better future for all.
values.subheading: Our core values that guide everything we do.

leadership.title: Leadership
leadership.description: We empower young leaders to create positive change in their communities and globally.

diversity.title: Diversity & Inclusion
diversity.description: We embrace cultural and intellectual diversity and believe in the power of difference in building a strong, cohesive community.

impact.title: Positive Impact
impact.description: We strive to create a positive and sustainable impact in the lives of youth and communities around the world.

innovation.title: Innovation & Creativity
innovation.description: We encourage innovation and creative thinking to find innovative solutions to contemporary challenges.

community.title: Community & Connection
community.description: We build strong and connected communities based on love, understanding, and mutual support.

global.title: Global Vision
global.description: We work with a global mindset to unite efforts and exchange experiences to build a better world for all.

values.description: Our core values guide everything we do

compassion.title: Compassion
compassion.description: We believe in the importance of empathy and understanding in building strong human relationships.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We are committed to developing sustainable solutions that preserve our resources for future generations.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We always strive for excellence in all our work and initiatives.

testimonials.heading: What Our Volunteers Say
testimonials.subheading: What our volunteers say about Shababna.

volunteer1.name: Ahmed Mahmoud
volunteer1.content: My experience with Shababna has been life-changing. I've learned new leadership skills and connected with youth from around the world.

volunteer2.name: Sarah Al-Khalidi
volunteer2.content: Shababna organization has given me the opportunity to lead projects with real impact in my community. I'm proud of what we've achieved together.

volunteer3.name: Mohammed Al-Ali
volunteer3.content: The programs offered by Shababna have helped me discover my abilities and develop my skills. I recommend every young person to join.
